document_data.name: Marimo
document_data.type: Moss<ref group=note name="moss">Real life [[wikipedia:marimo|marimo]] are growths of green algae rather than moss. However, the in-game tooltips of [Illuminated Marimo] and [Sickly Marimo] in ''[[Neverwinter (game)|Neverwinter]]'' describe them as a "type of moss".
document_data.mainbody: '''Marimo''' were a kind of [[moss]] that grew into the shape of a ball. They were found at the bottoms of certain lakes, including [[Lake Glorfindar]].
document_data.Usage: The marimo of Lake Glorfindar were sometimes inadvertently caught by fishers. Bright [[lumen]]s or flakes of [[blacklead]] were often found within cut open specimens.
